item.title: META
item.description: score:-93 Chances: Meta Platforms, Inc. has significant upside potential compared to other tech leaders. The company recently announced a dividend and a massive share repurchase program, indicating confidence in its future performance. The FoA segment, which includes Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp, continues to drive growth and engagement.
